website_summaries.verdict: Rich, long-lasting color and ample applications make this eyebrow dye kit the best deal available and a versatile option that will provide expected results for most users.
pros: You get a lot of value for your money with this complete kit of 20 individual applications
The ammonia-free, no-drip formula is easy to apply
In addition to eyebrows, can be used almost anywhere color touch-ups are needed
cons: May not work very well on coarse, stubborn gray hairs
Some shades tend to be lighter than expected on some individuals

customer_reviews.title: 😎
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I just did the application. Package came on time. No damages to packaging. Easy directions. This application is "Dark Brown"
customer_reviews.author: MSQ

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product Experience Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this brand before but when I ordered it this time it came with more color capsules and a bigger bottle of the mixing solution. In the past this never irritated my skin but I used this kit the other night and woke up with extremely irritated eyebrows that are currently so flakey and scaly that I have to cover them with makeup!!!!! I have experience with at home tinting and professional tinting please I advise you to NOT purchase this product and find an alternative or just get them professionally tinted. Zero stars... I've been suffering for a week now with painful brows
customer_reviews.author: Somara

customer_reviews.title: Byccch!!!
customer_reviews.text: My eyebrows are snatched! I was a little scared that it either wouldn't work or it'd look a mess but guuuurl No!! I wash my face twice a day with one of those electric facial brushes and use oil moisturizers and numerous facial masks and my eyebrows still look flawless 5 days later. I redo them 1-2 times every 2 weeks or so. I have very sensitive skin and it didn't irritate or break me out. I only use about half of the powder in one capsule each time. Love love love this tint for my eyebrows!
customer_reviews.author: Tyee

customer_reviews.title: Great pigment. Good alternative to microblading if done right.
customer_reviews.text: I'm an eyebrow person. I have to fill them in daily, which is time consuming and it gets old. So I'm happy to say that this is a great temp product if you are wanting to lessen or halt altogether the time spent to fill in your brows. I'm still on the fence with microblading, so this is a welcome alternative. The longer you leave the product on, the darker it saturates the skin and hairs. FYI, MAKE SURE YOU MIX THE POWDER WELL. I didn't the first time, and had some spots of pigment. Easy fix though, just reapply. Great product as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: b00bzi11a

customer_reviews.title: Some Issues
customer_reviews.text: I returned the 1st box which was used & had fingerprint smudges on the developer bottle. The 2nd box was fine. Do an allergy test if you have sensitive skin. My mom did the test on her arm and woke up with the area red & puffy. But ultimately I like this tint kit. It works well on my eyebrows. I used the method of putting on a layer, wiping it off after 30 seconds, checking, then adding another layer until I was happy with the results. The tint lasts about 10 days, more if you apply it darker at first. If you are applying for event, do so maybe 3 days before so the color can fade a little.
customer_reviews.author: your ex-roommate

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: This tint is great. HOWEVER, the applicator is horrible at creating a natural brow tint. I found a spoolie and the brush, together, work to make the perfect brow. You could do multiple eyebrows with just one pill. I emptied all my powder/pills in a resealable container to conserve product. Also, the tint looks best on the second day but quickly fades soon after. Still on the hunt for a more lasting tint kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! All I needed was a fill since my ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! All I needed was a fill since my brows are so light. One application was good enough to do mine and my daughters brows. The application lasted 4 days. It's easy to mix and apply, make sure you have some cotton swabs on hand and a washcloth, the area you're applying this to needs to be clean and dry for the application to adhere. I gave 4 stars because I was hoping the application would've at least lasted a week, but it was less then a week. Overall a great product, it definitely beat applying temporary brow tint every day.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M Booth

customer_reviews.title: In house brow tint
customer_reviews.text: First time I follow the instructions and left the product for 3-5 minutes but i felt that it didn't tint that much so I had to re-apply the product. The second time that I used the product I applied it for 15 minutes and the results were excellent. If you don't have sensitive skin I would suggest to leave it for 15 min, but for a more natural look take the product from the beginning of the brow after 3 minutes so it wont tint that hard. The tint stayed for around 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Ureña

customer_reviews.title: So perfect and saves me time when doing my makeup
customer_reviews.text: So perfect and saves me time when doing my makeup. Instructions are easy and everything is provided in the box. It says to use one full capsule of the tint, but in the end I had a lot left over. Half a capsule with half the recommended developer should suffice; also means more uses for the value with this method. Ladies must buy and try!!
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: I use this to tint my eyebrows. I love it so much because it is so cheap and literally takes about two minutes to use. I use a damp q-tip to wipe it off when done. The tint lasts a few weeks for me before it completely fades. At first, it is a little too dark/fake looking but I use brow makeup over it anyway when I go out to achieve a more perfect look. A year later, I am still using the same package I purchased last year. I have sensitive skin and have had no issues. Be careful though, it stains counters, ...everything..if you make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine magic!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and looks natural. Tip: use a toothpick to mix the product so you can keep your brush clean. Use as little product as possible on the brush so you can be exacting with your application. Whatever is left on skin may stain skin for a day or more. It darkens VERY quickly. If you’re fair, try one brow at a time so you can watch it processing and remove before your brown brows become black. If they do, no worries, it fades in time. I start with the lightest, thinnest area of my brow so it starts processing first as it needs a few more seconds than the thicker areas.
customer_reviews.author: MomItAll

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Much easier and takes less time to use then the Roux brow and lash dye. Also lasts a LOT longer. I had to use the Roux twice a week. With this product I've used it twice in a month. I didn't need to use it the second time, but I wanted to see if the color would get darker. Which it didn't it stays true to it's color. I recommend to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Raschka

customer_reviews.title: Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I read so many review and pondered this but it dosnt work at all and I leave it on there. It’s just a waste and the box was all smashed when I arrived. Like I used it 3 times and still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: My overall experience with the product is 4 stars because as you can see the product works. The first video is the product without the tint and the second video is after an doing the tint treatment. The only con I experienced which might vary from person to person is that it doesn’t last long but that might be me just washing my face all the time. But it’s a great product and I totally recommend plus it saves you money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly ufeanyui

customer_reviews.title: Nice to be able to do my own brows!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a product designed for the brows that's easy to use. I like that it comes with single "serving" capsules. I get pretty decent coverage that lasts at least 2 week if I don't use oil based facial cleaner. I do leave it on longer than directed to get more depth. Product will last a while. A good buy for the value. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EVGreen

customer_reviews.title: One of my go to products now
customer_reviews.text: I love the individual capsule style and the fact that it has an activator cream, instead of using water like some of the other products I've used in the past. The color is not red, which is great. I like that the depth of the color depends on how long you leave it on. I did notice it comes off after just 2 face washes. I try not to scrub my eyebrows as much, but it definitely doesn't last as long as I would like it too. I have delicate skin, and didn't have a reaction to this product. I did do an allergy test before using however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As I’ve gotten older, my eyebrows seem to have lost pigment. Not to worry, this product works great. Some reviews said that it didn’t last long but I followed instructions exactly and the color lasted a good 2-3 months. Highly recommend this product. The only con is that one capsule has so much product in it so it’s almost a waste but with 20 per box and it lasting anywhere from 2-3 months before needing to reapply, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amberlina

customer_reviews.title: Completely ineffective "dye"! Did not dye gray roots!
customer_reviews.text: One of those bad buys - did absolutely nothing for me. I wanted to give it one more try before deciding on whether to return it or not and so now I've missed the return window by one day! The mix looks like a pathetic light gray color and it did NOT darken even a single gray root. Not sure if this is an old product? I'm reading others say it even temporarily stained their skin area and I'm very surprised by that! I left it on gray roots and it did not darken them even a little bit! I'm so disappointed. I want a product that works or I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: heartfelt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful brows
customer_reviews.text: We are not professionals. My daughter actually purchased this and used it for the first time last night. The instructions are easy to follow and the results are wonderful. She used it on her eyebrows, and then had some product left over and did my eyebrows. I'm 45, and I have some silver eyebrow hairs that I haven't been real happy with =) and you can't pluck the darn things or soon you'll have no brows left. I left the product on for 2 1/2 minutes, and the results are amazing! All the grey is covered, and my eyebrows look great, if i do say so myself. I'll buy my own after she runs out or stops sharing with me.
customer_reviews.author: Redd =)

customer_reviews.title: Alergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this tint and used it monthly to keep my fading eyebrows looking dark and fresh. But over several months I began to notice that the skin under the brows was red/inflamed. I ultimately stopped using it as each month the reaction got worse. And yes I followed the directions and time exactly. Wished it would have worked out because it was convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Pbear-Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great value. Don’t waste your money in a salon.
customer_reviews.text: Product works and is easy to use. Will stain your nails tho so be careful when using. Tint lasts about 2-3 weeks, depending how much makeup/face washing you do. I got the dark brown and I get so many compliments. You only need to leave it on for about a minute and it’s good to go. I would definite recommend doing the tinting yourself rather than paying a salon tons of money for five minutes of your time. If you ever didn’t like it, you can rub some oil on it and most of the color will come out. Trust me, this works just ask good as a salon, for way less money, and so easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kel1992

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: They worked ok on the test batch and then the first use, but a few weeks later when I went to use them again the capsules won't open and the one I managed to get open mixed up lumpy. cosmeticbeautyplace was the seller on my order. I emailed them but got no response. Maybe they sold me old stock or something? I'm not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Great Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to dye my mostly white medium length beard. I tried a Henna based dye and I didn’t feel that it worked well and just took way too long to apply. This product colored my beard evenly and it looks natural. I cannot comment on removal. I figure I’ll have to use the product about every 2 weeks due to fading as well as touching up to accommodate for beard growth. I think the capsules are okay but it might be more convenient to just have a small container with a measuring scoop. Overall I believe this product is worth a try for anyone coloring their beard.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review after my first use and I am in love with this product! It’s my first time using eyebrow tint and it gave me a new meaning of life! Amaaaazing tint, I will definitely continue to use it. I am not sure how long it will last but I don’t mind using it every 2-3 days. It took me around 20-25 minutes to get the dark brown color that I was looking for! The instructions says apply for 1-2 minutes but didn’t work for me and I had to reapply and leave it for 15 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hamad

customer_reviews.title: I'll never go to a pro again!
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting my brows waxed/tinted for a year and i pay so much money because my natural hairs are SO blonde. I had to go every like 2 weeks! but this? WHAT A LIFE SAVER. my eyebrows look amazing. I love my waxing girl but yeah I'm tinting mine myself forever now!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scotti Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Nice tint.
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. You get a lot. If you're using this for your eyebrows only I would suggest not to mix an entire capsule. It would be a waste. You'll end up only using a tiny amount and tossing most of it. I mix a tiny amount of the capsule at a time. It tints my eyebrows in a very natural way. I leave it on for up to 25 mins at times. The only downside is it doesnt last very long. You need to tint your brows about once a week. It's basically henna, it fades and washes away every time you shower or wash your face. But good product.
customer_reviews.author: abigail pierre

customer_reviews.title: Men who use this for beards beware!! bad allergic reaction!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because It got some good reviews..Bottom line if you get a bad reaction from Just for Men beard , you'll get the same if not worse from this product..I am assuming due to the fact that this products has ppd in it, which half the male population is allergic too...Got bad redness and bumps on face..never again..staying away from all products that contain ppd!! Go with Black Beard ..its like mascara and wont last that long but it doesn't look that bad and never got allergic reaction from it..and no I don't work for them! you all have been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J of Levittown

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $20 spent.  Great performance, economical!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to dye my own eyebrows at home. And it works wonderfully! Instead of paying $25 to gave them done in a salon, I'm saving that money! It was about $20, which I believe was more expensive than others, but you have 20 capsules for dyeing. It's so easy to use. And the color holds up well. Dont go to a salon, buy this instead and take yourself out to a nice dinner!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mengucci

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is the best random product I have tried for filling in and darling brows, I over plucked in my teen years and as a adult have been growing them back but there’s spots that just don’t grow well, I have had my brows Microbladed even!! And that didn’t last at all... this product is a temp product but for me it’s worth it to re “dye” them as needed instead of having to fill them in daily with make up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five star product
customer_reviews.text: One capsule yeilded 15 applications applied every 2-3 weeks. Really like the results and they LAST. I leave on 30 min bc I have some grays to cover. There are A LOT of capsules in the package too. I open the capsule and keep in another container the powder. I mix equal portions of developer and powder and apply the paste for 30 min, no problems , very very pleased! will re-purchase for sure so long as the price doesn’t go up
customer_reviews.author: bhelmly

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I'm cut out for this
customer_reviews.text: My brows and lashes are very blond so wanted to try coloring myself for once. Only ended up trying on one eye because it was not easy. They probably exist for more money but the kit should use/recommend tools to protect under the eye and come with additional mascara wands. I either need a better brand, more tools or a professional (probably the latter)
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Barber

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my eyebrows suck and i figured “why not” it’s easy to use, it cause pretty fast. it’s instructions are pretty basic. it comes with color capsules that have a tint powder and the developer, a little brush and a super tiny cute perfect little mixing bowl. it made my eyebrows darker and more defined but not for to long. BUT still great. i’ll definitely keep up with this because it’s not to much work and easy to do
customer_reviews.author: morasha estacio

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I bought this product after watching some YouTube videos and decided to give it a try. I have very sparse brows and I usually fill them in with a brow pomade from Anastasia Beverly Hills, but recently tried “brow sculpting” that a local beauty spa offered. It essentially was this exact stuff and it cost $50 for one session that only lasted 2 weeks on my brows! This is JUST as good if not better! I have control of how I want my brows to look and it’s super cost efficient! Give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Aleshia Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Browtastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is the dark brown. I left it in over 6 minutes ( 4 recommended) ..I forgot! Soooo it was a little too dark. However, it's easy to use. I did remove some of the color initially, but it's pretty much set now. Can't answer how long it lasts as this is my first experience with this brand color comes in capsule, separate developer, and a brush with a little cup. Easy, peasy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura C

customer_reviews.title: Dark brown is the new gray?! (Unless you lose your brows)
customer_reviews.text: This turned my eyebrows an odd grayish color, and then they started falling out by the next day!! Luckily, the color didn’t last more than a few days, which would have made me pretty mad if it hadn’t been such a letdown. I think I’ll just stick to the salon from now on- live and learn, I guess, but probably not on my face anymore! 😅
customer_reviews.author: Make_Lemonade_Design

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!! My eyebrows are brown again!!!😃
customer_reviews.text: I just tried the product for the first time and it was super easy to use and my eyebrows are all brown again!😊 I will do an update to share the longevity but I really like that I will wake up tomorrow and not have to figure out how to get a brow product to stay on my brows all day. I have nice brows but just started getting a few grey hairs (quite alarming) within the last year.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, no irritation, natural looking, boom.
customer_reviews.text: What else do you need to know? No, seriously, it's all right there in the title. I would advise using this BEFORE hopping into the shower... it is MUCH easier to remover the residue in the shower than to wash my face off in the sink. I can't say for sure how long the product lasts, I usually do a new layer maybe once a week
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Di Sciascio

customer_reviews.title: Easy, looks natural but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use. I use it to fill in my eyebrows and lasts about 2 days. I assume that if you use it to darken your eyebrows it lasts longer, but if you want to use it to tint the skin then it will not last very long as the natural oils in your skin get rid of the tint. great buy though, it really works and looks very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Starwars girl

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting tint
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use and gives excellent result. My last tint was 5 weeks ago, and eye brow color is still fresh. I was paying anywhere from $10-$40 to have this done professionally. (One shop owner was using regular hair dye, which is not good for for eyebrow hair follicles.) No harsh chemicals. My skin is very sensitive and I didn't have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: K R

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN USING JUST FOR MEN!!
customer_reviews.text: Debated buying this or continue using Just for Men on my eyebrows but this definitely did the job way better. I have it in the Dark Brown color. I have used it twice so far and have used half of one capsule! Noticed it got lighter and lighter in color a bit after each wash. I washed my face everyday and lasted about 2 weeks before I gave it a quick touch up!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: You have to be super precise or you will give your self some thick eyebrows like the ones I gave myself. Luckily it doesn't last for a very long time. It is not hard to use but the powder does get every where because it's a little tricky to pull the capsule apart. My daughter said it looked like Sharpie because in reality, all it does is stain your skin. It just does not look natural, IMO. Used it one time, no I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Wtf
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about this one. I kept it on for “jet black” result and it looks like I shaved my eyebrows off, but with eyebrows. Like it’s kind of ashy gray instead of brown or black. The eyebrow on the left is my eyebrows after using the kit(well it’s been like two days) with no makeup. The right is with a little bit of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Tolli Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Easy & No Skin Sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an in-home easy tint for my eyebrows as they tend to lighten and then look sparse and unflattering. Since I have sensitive skin, I worried it wouldn’t be possible, but this tint is perfect! I use it about once a month (one capsule is plenty) for two minutes and it transforms my brows completely; I feel much more confident without brow powder after tinting. And more importantly, no skin sensitivity! Highly recommend! With fair skin and light brown hair, the dark brown tint is perfect. Photo: Before on top, After on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere...Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of time and money. I have dark almost black brows with white growing in. I followed directions and applied for a total of three times in my initial attempt. This product didn't even begin to cover the white. And, of course, I'm a couple of days over my 30 days for a return to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time tinting my barely there eyebrows. It was very simple mixing the cream and powder. I did use some vaseline to outline my brows that I didn't want tinted. This was a bit difficult so next time around, I think I would put the cream and clean the edges quickly. I only had it on for about 2 minutes before it began burning. Wiped if off and my brows were significantly darker. Seems legit. I do have dark brown almost black hair and the dark brown did work for my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: Lainee

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this is the mail 20 minutes ago and I had to come on here to write a review because I can’t believe this actually worked! This product is literally, life changing for me. I finally have eyebrows, I will save tons of time in the morning and I can go swimming without reappearing like a different person when I come out of the water. Love this! It is so easy to use. I was done in under 5 minutes. Can I be a spokesperson for this product ? Thank you so much to whoever came up with this. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia A

customer_reviews.title: I had doubts, but not anymore!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the results I got! It gives the eyebrows such a bold beautiful finish & super easy to use, and the directions say to use a full capsule. I found that there was quite a bit of product left over afterwards. Next time I will definitely use only half a capsule with the developer. Should last a long time doing it that way. I only put 3 stars for longevity because I don’t know how long it last exactly yet. I will update when it starts to where off🤗 and say how long it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear21🤍🐾

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if I was having an off day or just because it was my first try but The eye pads weren’t sticking well and I feel like the spoolies provided didn’t really distribute the product, it got all over my fingernails because I was trying to clean my eyelids. It did tint my eyebrows nicely. I’m going to try my eyelashes again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rivera

customer_reviews.title: We have eyebrows!!
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised how much I really, really like this stuff. I got this to use with my daughter and sister (sister and I are the over plucking 90’s kids and daughter is of the bold eyebrow kids) so this was a night of fun for us. I would highly recommend this. I can’t say the staying power yet, but very happy so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I have like transparent eyebrows lol
customer_reviews.text: I have like transparent eyebrows lol. They are so light that you cannot see them so I have to fill them in all the time, but then i found this. ITS A FREAKING GOD SEND. Omg. my eyebrows look fabulous. Since my eyebrows are very very light I left it on longer than it said to and they came out dark brown. I ordered the color dark brown so its as expected. Love this product!!! Definitely going to be a life time customer now
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Been using for years, I love it and still do
customer_reviews.text: Been using for years will continue to as well. Love this product and lasted me 2 years when used sparingly! Dont need to use a WHOLE capsule! I open them and store the powder so when I need a touch up I can just take a little scoop and it's good to go. Brows look amazing people always ask what I use.
customer_reviews.author: kms1994

customer_reviews.title: From see through brows to waking up with perfect brows
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye are the days of paying to get my eyebrows tinted every two weeks, this is magic! Like hello eyebrows 🤗 I like the color of this tint (dark brown) even better than the tint I was paying for every two weeks to get. Super easy and forgiving! I am naturally blonde and have very light eyebrows, this is a perfect solution to keep my eyebrows up at home. This entire pack that will last a year cost me the same amount as one eyebrow tint at a salon. Obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Kiah Toner

customer_reviews.title: Best Brow Tint
customer_reviews.text: Best brow tint, just wish it came in a pen applicator. Been using this product for almost 2 years and it is hands down, AMAZING. Took a couple of times to get into my groove, but now it's like second nature. I use Dark Brown, mix it up, apply with my own angel brow brush and let it sit for 10 mins. Wipe off with damp cotton ball. Lasts up to 3 days, maybe 4 with a quick touch up.
customer_reviews.author: Furdographer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific easy eyebrow dye!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous different eyebrow dyes but I found this one to be the best by far!! I have blonde hair and need to dye my eyebrows. This is so easy to use and only takes 4 minutes compared to other kinds. It usually lasts about 2 weeks before I have to redye my eyebrows but lasts much longer than other dyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love this - Why paint when you can dye?
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest, most effective way to give yourself a full set of permanent eyebrows! I paint this on and a few minutes later wipe away and I have permanent eyebrows in a rich color and look natural. I apply about once a month and can skip the daily paint-on project. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Scher

customer_reviews.title: Great brow tinting kit!
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to mix. But for a first timer, it was a bit difficult to apply but I know within practice, it’ll be better. I will update of how long it will last, until then...I do like this product. UPDATE: it last me 3 days but only because I’ve been working out, BUT this is still holy grail for me. Second try, its a piece of a cake. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER pay to have my eyebrows tinted again!!!! It was soooo easy and fast! I ordered the dark brown, and within 2 minutes my eyebrows were dark and perfect!!!!! I can’t believe I had been spending so much money to have them done when $10 gives me 20 applications! Wooo hoo!!!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I am someone who naturally has white blonde hair and eyebrows, but I’ve been coloring my hair black for the most part since I was 12. I usually color my eyebrows when I touch up my roots, but then I have to deal with the fading until the next time I do my roots. Now I don’t! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great tint for eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Wow is this easy to use! I left on my brows one minute for starters and ended up with 1.5 minutes working best. So fast and easy to tint. It's been two weeks, and I haven't noticed any fading. I had to contact the company as the Amazon distributor left out the developer. They sent me a replacement bottle very quickly and were very pleasant to talk to. I'd highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolette S.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm head over heels for this product! Just did my brow tint today. The first pic is one week after a microblading touch up, second pic is 2weeks after said touch up and after the tint (I used dark brown). It was so easy to use! I left in on for 2 minutes (that wasn't enough to notice a difference). Then re- applied and left it on for 6 minutes. Perfect. I HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love this tint!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to mix, so easy to apply and it stays a long time. This is 6 weeks after tinting. During the summer my hair gets pretty light but it’s naturally dark. The last time I mixed a capsule to tint mine, I was able to tint two of my friend’s eyebrows as well. It goes a long ways.
customer_reviews.author: A Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Tint!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, these previous reviews are spot on! This tint is so easy to use and apply ... and it actually works. This was my first time tinting my eyebrows; the directions included are straight forward. You will not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Chung

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed by the product. I reapply it every four weeks- which is a small price to pay to cover the white hairs. Don’t have to use eyebrow pencil to fill in space anymore. Make sure you only use a third of a capsule per eyebrow application, no one needs a full.
customer_reviews.author: Great

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the best tint out there
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best tint out there. Amazing price, amazing color and best results I’ve seen so far. I do let the tint sit for longer than prescribed. 10mins tips for the outer end and 5mins for the inner eyebrow. I have thick eyebrows with certain areas having less hair but with this tint I no longer need to fill in my eyebrows. I also used this product on my mom who has very thin and light eyebrows and it worked great, obviously leaving the tint less time than mine
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this Brow Tent
customer_reviews.text: I use this to tent my brows every other week! Amazing product that I will use for a lifetime. If you have great brows, but your hair tent is light, this product is for you! I am not a big fan of penciling in my eyebrows, so with this I don't have too. All I have to do is shape them with a clear brow gel. Amazing stuff, must try, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Candra Lessing

customer_reviews.title: Test it on a small area of skin first !
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the worst allergic reaction of my life. Around my mouth and jaw swelled up something fierce. I thought JFM was bad at burning the skin but this product was way worse. However, I must be fair not all skin is the same. I will tell anyone that is bent on trying this product is do a small patch test prior to putting it all over your beard or mustache.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.text: It works really well. The color looks pretty natural and not orange at all which I was pleased about. If you are careful you can use half a capsule to make it last longer. Caution if you have sensitive skin. It burned a little bit so make sure to follow the directions and don't leave it on too long. It will stain the skin for a few days but I liked that because it just looked like I had penciled it in. I redo it every 2 weeks to a month and it saves me a lot of time penciling in my brows in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Draco

customer_reviews.title: HUGE $ savings
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting my brows tinted and threaded until Covid when they closed. This stuff is amazing. Every time I went to the threader, it was around $23 and the color lasted maybe a week. There are 20 capsules, so enough for 20 times, plus there is enough cream that I can do another person's brows as well. So for less than the price of one visit, 2 people have 20 colorings. It also lasted much longer than the salon dye- the first time we used it, we both noticed an extreme difference, probably 3x as long. I will definitely be repurchasing when we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I have paid a ton of money to have my eyebrows and eye lashes tinted every month and now I don’t have too. Check out my before and after pics. They are too good! I will be continuing to buy this stuff!! They make my eye lashes look amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: *Please read this review before using*
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful with this product. If you leave it on too long, it will make you look like a monster. I couldn’t even stand to look at my girlfriend. She looked like she had 2 angry caterpillars on her forehead. The crazy thing is she only left it on for 3 minutes, so when I say short, I mean short. I’m not saying you shouldn’t buy this product, I’m just saying be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Mehrnoosh

customer_reviews.title: ***Lasts couple days and not intended for brows***
customer_reviews.text: My experience wasn’t half as good as most of these reviews unfortunately. You get 20 capsules and per capsule you could probably get a couple uses out of them too. Application was straightforward and quick but it gave me a weird lightheaded feeling with a slight migraine which was worrying. The results lasted a couple days tops although marketed as 6 weeks. After random examination of the box after couple uses it warns to not use on brows or eyelashes as it may cause blindness. Unfortunately I have now discontinued use and will return.
customer_reviews.author: Jenw

customer_reviews.title: used it for my eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Updated review. I have used it a few times, I put a thick coating on my eyebrows to saturate the grey and wait the full 5 minutes. It seems to be working better, your skin will have a color stain for a day but washes off. I was hoping it would cover the grey in my eyebrows but it really didn't do that well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to use and the dark brown shade was perfect for my medium brown hair color. It didn't have any hint of red to it, which is what I wanted. I left it on for a total of two and a half minutes, but I would suggest starting out at one minute and then building up so you don't go too dark. It didn't irritate my skin at all to reapply it to go darker. Considering what it costs to have your brows tinted professionally, this is worth it. I can't attest to how long the tint lasts as it has only been four days, but I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Stu

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it actually works. Before picture with pencil, second picture with tint no makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: brenda adames

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stain skin like in customer review photos
customer_reviews.text: The photo reviews for this product were deceiving. I was hoping for something that would stain my skin to give the appearance of more eyebrow hair in areas where it is thin, aka a miracle which was what the costumer review photos showed. It ONLY dyes the hair darker. I don't plan to use this product again. However, I found it to be useful if you want to dye your eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthy product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It applies pretty well, but doesn't stain my skin in places I am missing hair quite to the amount that others have shown in their photos/reviews. It does do this, but it does not last long in those areas. This lasts longer than I expected. My first time trying it, I didn't have to do my eyebrows (filling in) at all. I would say it lasted about a week - a week and a half. I wish the tool to actually apply it was a bit thinner to get a slightly better application. Fast shipping! Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Mikilah Gurule

customer_reviews.title: Lasts less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people here say this product lasts a few weeks, but I don't see how this is possible unless you don't shower or do any physical activity. The color is nice, but for the amount of time it lasts, I may as well draw my brows in daily.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Bold eyebrows on point
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I seen the reviews and knew this would be a no Brainer. I left the tint on for about 2-3 min and made a huge difference in my eyebrows. I did forget to take a before and after picture next time I will. My eyebrows look so bold now and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ITSIRENEEY_XO

customer_reviews.title: A COVID life-saver
customer_reviews.text: Before dying your eyebrows was a thing I walked through life with blonde, hardly noticeable brows. Since COVID hit, I've tried to cut down on the cosmetic appointments. This dye kit is literally amazing. Super easy to use and gets me through between my infrequent appointments to my brow gal. I needed to leave on longer than the recommended time limit but once I got the hang of how the dye took to my hair it was simple.
customer_reviews.author: BNelson

customer_reviews.title: Must have for anyone with light or thinning eyebrows!
customer_reviews.text: I finally have eyebrows after using this product! After years of over plucking, my eyebrows were thin and spotty looking. I couldn't be happier! It was easy to use and worked and after 6 weeks, it's just now needing done again. I did what the other reviewers suggested and applied for 1.5-2 minutes at a time and rinsed, then repeated until I had the desired color. I did not end up with stained skin and my hair stylist saw me the next day and was super impressed with it
customer_reviews.author: JKEAE31

customer_reviews.title: This is bomb!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my eyebrow lifetime?!?!? I just got eyelash extensions done for the first time and the day before did this tint. Braaaa.... all the moms at school are jelly thinking I’m loooking so fly. Get yourself this stuff, it’s seriously fool proof!!! I keep a baby wipe near by so if I mess up I clean it up right away and no oopsies. I’ve left it 5 minutes and AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: vickywog

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I was scared getting this, mainly because I have such sensitive skin but honestly I’m blown away! This was gentle on the skin and I didn’t have to fill my eyebrows in at all! I was amazed with the results and am very happy with this product. Defiantly a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Browtastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Obessessed! I have naturally uneven sparse eyebrows. I routinely fill brows with make up to even them out. This stuff stains the skin to give appearance of full brows. Can be done in less than 5 mins and does not come off with water it just fades with time. I have blonde balyage hair with dark roots, the dark brown may have been too dark nonetheless my eyebrows looked amazing😆Will be purchasing lighter shade brown. Awesome beauty must have for enhancing brows!!
customer_reviews.author: deft

customer_reviews.title: Product not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product claims it is hypoallergenic. I switched from another coloring because of the skin inflammation it caused. This one does, too. In addition, it is very messy and the instructions are vague making it even harder to use. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Was so nervous to use but awesome results!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have blonde hair and dyed my hair dark brown so it basically looked like I had no eyebrows. I didn't mind penciling them on but after a shower it still bothered me. Ordered this and wow!!!!!! So impressed with the results!!!! I wish I would have been a bit more careful putting the dye on so my skin didn't get dyed too but oh well. Even though I have blonde hair I had to leave it on for the full time for it to fully color my eyebrows. Still worked great!!!
customer_reviews.author: BrittneeNR

customer_reviews.title: Beware— burns for days— not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wow beware— my eyebrows are still burning 4 days later and just getting worse. Not worth it— never had such a bad reaction to a dye. Threw out and would never buy again. In fact I’m never doing at home dying of anything again after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: MB2

customer_reviews.title: I WAKE UP WITH EYEBROWS AND LASHES
customer_reviews.text: This is my second box of this stuff, I have been using it for 2 years now. As discouraged, I use it on my eyelashes as well as my brows. Lasts for about a month before it needs retouching. Tip to not blind yourself when trying to dye lashes: use the little disposable tools used to clean behind braces (looks like a mini mascara wand) to apply the dye & keep baby wipes near by to wipe eyes if any thing burns
customer_reviews.author: Livver

customer_reviews.title: Holy Cow!
customer_reviews.text: It really works great! I was skeptical but it worked exactly as I would like it to. It also seems like a crappy deal until you figure out that there are 20 capsules, meaning you can do it 20 times and that makes it only a dollar apiece. And I actually shared it with my wife so that made it $.50 each. It worked super good, super fast. No allergic reactions here. Just deep brown brows like a spring chicken!
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kris

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again in natrual black
customer_reviews.text: This worked wonderfully. At first I left it on for about 3 minutes and it looked a little stained not how I expected, but then went back and added more product that time I left it in for 15 mins accidentally (my timer wasn't on). The end results I loved very much, but because the product was on for so long that my skin slightly burned. The burning sensation went away after I removed the dye, again that was completely my fault. I will buy this again in natrual black, and I'd recommend this to everyone trying to get a fuller look to your brows.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby M.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use, great color
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I got the dark brown and it turned out darker than I thought, but I quickly got used to it. I was surprised how quickly it worked. I left it on for 2 minutes and then removed it. My brows were quite a bit darker. Next time I'll try 90 seconds. I first did it three weeks ago and my brows still look good. My brows are quite narrow and thin so adding more color makes them appear thicker.
customer_reviews.author: D. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: My brows are already pretty dark but I dye my hair jet black (my natural hair color is a dark ash brown) so I wanted to try this to make things easier on the days I don't feel like filling them in. Minimal staining, I was pleasantly surprised, but it took 2 applications to get them noticeably darker. The first time I left the dye on for about 2 minutes, the second time about 4. If you're a natural blonde or redhead this would be a great kit for you, but I'd recommend trying the medium brown rather than this shade. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen A Burwell

customer_reviews.title: So easy and it works !
customer_reviews.text: So happy I decided to purchase! I was paying $30ish each time to get a brow tint at a salon every 2 months or so. I’ll save money and time by doing it myself at home and it’s seriously so easy. Just mix the solution- leave on your brows for 5 min and wipe off. Seriously looks the same as when I went to the salon. Just make sure after you paint on your brows to use a q-tip to wipe off the excess on the skin bcz it does stain your skin a little bit for a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Best for waterproof swimming
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and get started with HOWEVER if you have oily skin like me, it will not last you 14 days. It maybe lasts 5-7. I mostly use this for when I’m going to be active or go swimming. I will tint my eyebrows the day before so that I have waterproof color while I’m out and about. For everyday use, I still like to add more filling in on top of it tho
customer_reviews.author: M Colon

customer_reviews.title: Great but light brown is darker than dark brown!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. BUT- I used to be blonde and used the light brown tint- my natural brows are totally translucent- and they came out a pretty good color, but recently I went brunette and got the dark brown tint to match my hair better. As it turns out, the LIGHT brown shade is much DARKER than the DARK brown is. So I will throw this out because it’s too light, and just keep buying the light brown. It is super easy to use but I do wish it lasted longer. Maybe a week tops and it’s pretty much faded. It’s still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks very natural and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Looks very natural and very easy to use. I recommend building the color up slowly by reapplying it a couple of times in short periods of time vs leaving it on for a long time. I mix the batch and complete one brow at a time for best color control. I apply the tint to one brow, leave it on for 1 minute. Wipe it off and adjust the tint where more color is needed. After the first minute, the second and third applications are only left on for 30seconds each time. Make sure you have a wet paper towel and clean q-tips near by to help clean up any mess quickly.
customer_reviews.author: PaNhia Thoj

customer_reviews.title: Great product to cover gray
customer_reviews.text: Bought the dark brown to cover gray in my eyebrows. Worked perfectly. Result is very natural looking. Just be careful at first with how long you leave it on. Color faded a bit after 4-5 weeks & needed reapplication. Easy & took only a few minutes. As others have said, you can open the capsules and pour out a little powder to mix with the developer. Mixing up a whole cap would waste most of the product for just eyebrows. The box will last a very long time. Will buy again if I ever use up this one!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow322

customer_reviews.title: Warning Product Changed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product, brand ect...for years!! I have loved it. Literally the last time I ordered it the product is totally different. The color is weak! Absolute terrible change. What happened!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timshel

customer_reviews.title: 100% would recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this tint kit. It was SO EASY to use and really works well. I have absolutely no makeup on my brows in this pic. This pic was 2 dye sessions at 3 mins each to get this color. I’m 100% recommend this kit. Will continue ordering this!!
customer_reviews.author: smootybear

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to use and mix, The instructions are complete, you get 20 applications for less then a dollar. I didnt get an allergic reaction all in all it worked just as I had hoped. I dont know long it will last because I just applied it so that remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: SNdoye

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works 👍 well, nothing to be scared about. Easy to mix, easy to apply, not uncomfortable on the eye brow ( for me and I am pro intolerance when it comes to colouring products ). It is doing exactly what it says. No bad surprises as far as I am concern. I apply 4 days ago. Every morning I am surprise and grateful to have my eye brows already ready to go. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: DaniD

product_meta.title: Godefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit, Dark Brown, 20 Applications
product_meta.description: Color:Dark BrownGodefroy Professional Hair Color Tint Kit is ideal for coloring small areas of the scalp and facial hair. Pre-measured in separate capsule units, it gives you the versatility to use the exact amount of color with no waste. Great for use on beards, mustaches, sideburns, & temple, anywhere you need a little color. Also can be used for root touch ups in between hair color treatments. No odor & Blends well with existing color
feature_bullets: 20 application kit can be used on beards, mustaches, side burns, temples, anywhere you need a little color.
Root touch up to cover gray hair.
Complete kit. Everything you need included to get started.
20 Single application pre-measured capsules covers the most resistant gray hair.
Cream formula (no drip) for easy application. This Product is NOT intended for use on the eyelashes or eyebrows.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,455 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
